name: Whirled quilt pattern - PDF version
description:
One easy block creates an eye-catching quilt!

This fat-quarter-friendly pattern includes measurements and instructions for creating three quilt sizes: 

Crib: 50" x 64"
Throw: 64" x 78"
Twin: 78" x 92"

This is a beginner to intermediate level pattern. It is a four page pattern with detailed, easy-to-follow instructions for cutting, block construction and quilt top assembly. It is a digital file (PDF) which is ready for downloading and printing, or using right from your computer, iPad or tablet.

This PDF pattern will be emailed to you immediately after receiving payment.  It will be sent to the email address associated with your Paypal account.

No part of this pattern may be copied or reproduced in any form without written consent. Thank you!

name: Quartet quilt pattern - PDF version
description:
Looking for a fun way to use those jelly rolls you've been saving? Quartet is the answer! You can even use the jelly roll strips that are leftover from another project to make one of the smaller sizes of Quartet. Don't have any jelly rolls on hand? No problem - fabric requirements are also listed in yardage for those that prefer to choose fabrics that way.

Finished quilt sizes: **all sizes are included in this one pattern**

Baby: 39" x 39"
Throw: 59" x 79"
Twin: 79" x 98"
Queen: 98" x 98"

This is a four page pattern ready for downloading and printing, or using right from your computer or tablet. It includes detailed, easy-to-follow instructions for cutting, block construction and quilt top assembly, including diagrams.

This PDF pattern will be emailed to you immediately after receiving payment.  It will be sent to the email address associated with your Paypal account.

name: Sweet Talk pattern-PDF Version
description:
A fat quarter friendly quilt in two sizes
 

A fast and easy way to make half square triangles makes this quilt a breeze!  Grab your favorite fat quarters and discover a new love for sewing with triangles.

Fabric Requirements

THROW (50" x 60")
12 fat quarters OR 1/4 yd each of 12 fabrics
1/2 yard solid white
1/2 yard binding
2-1/2 yards backing

TWIN (71" x 88")
25 fat quarters OR 1/4 yd each of 25 fabrics
1/2 yard white
5/8 yard binding
5 yards backing

This PDF pattern will be emailed to you immediately after receiving payment.  It will be sent to the email address associated with your Paypal account.  

It is ready for downloading and printing or using right from your computer or iPad.  It includes easy-to-follow instructions for cutting, block construction and quilt top assembly.

name: Sprouts Table Runner and Topper pattern - PDF version
description:
These sweet vases of spring sprouts will bring a breath of fresh air to your table! This pattern for THREE sizes of table runner include detailed step-by-step instructions, diagrams and applique templates in several sizes. 

Sizes included in pattern:
small runner: 12" x 30"
large runner: 13" x 40"
circular table topper: 27" diameter

This PDF pattern will be emailed to you immediately after receiving payment.  It will be sent to the email address associated with your Paypal account.

If you are interested in a printed version of this pattern please contact me.

No part of this pattern may be copied or reproduced in any form without written consent. Thank you!

name: Holly Jolly Christmas Tree Skirt Pattern - PDF Version
description:
This quilted Christmas tree skirt will quickly become a cherished family heirloom and will be a wonderful addition to your holiday decor. Choose your 6 favorite Christmas fabrics and customize this tree skirt to fit your own personality and style. 

Materials Needed:
1/3 yard each of 6 different fabrics (at least 43" wide)
2-1/6 yard backing fabric
1/2 yard binding fabric
thin batting (at least 57" x 57")
2 yards of 3/8" grosgrain ribbon
cutting mat, rotary cutter and a ruler w/ 60 degree marking


Tree skirt finished measurement: 54" diameter from the widest point.

This PDF pattern will be emailed to you immediately after receiving payment.  It will be sent to the email address associated with your Paypal account.

No part of this pattern may be copied or reproduced in any form without written consent. Thank you!

This listing is for the PDF pattern only.

name: Star Table Runner - PDF Version
description:
This festive table runner measures 12" x 40" and is a quick project to add to your holiday decor.  It is easy to customize this to fit your personal style!  This one pattern can be used to make a Christmas table runner, or use blue and red fabrics for a patriotic version.

name: Stars Abound Pattern - PDF Version
description:
This quilt gives a well-deserved showcase to the classic sawtooth star.  Add bright, modern fabrics and create your own galaxy!

Finished Quilt Size:  56" x 72" (Throw Size)

Fabric Requirements:
1/6 yard each of 8 prints
1/4 yard each of 2 prints
white/background:  3-1/2 yards
binding:  1/2 yard
backing:  3-1/3 yard

This PDF pattern will be emailed to you immediately after receiving payment.  It will be sent to the email address associated with your Paypal account.

name: Dino Fractals pattern - PDF Version
description:
The inspiration for this quilt pattern came from a PBS show I was watching late one night. It was all about fractals and even though I understood maybe 1/3 of what they were talking about, I was inspired by their graphics. The first time I created this pattern I used a dinosaur print as the focus print, hence the name "Dino Fractals!"


Finished Quilt sizes: 
54"x 54" (baby size) 
54" x 72" (toddler bed or throw size)  
72" x 90" (twin size)


ALL quilt sizes are included in your pattern purchase. 

**see second photo for fabric requirements**



This pattern is a beginner-level pattern. It is a full-color, 9 page pattern ready for downloading and printing, or using right from your computer. It includes detailed instructions for cutting, block construction and quilt top assembly, including color diagrams.
